thread.title: Roblox games will be available on Xbox One in December
thread.title_full: Roblox games will be available on Xbox One in December - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Roblox games will be available on Xbox One in December
text:
“Bird Simulator” by Roblox video game creator Avian Skies. Left: The platform, coming to Xbox. “Bird Simulator” by Roblox video game creator Avian Skies....
Roblox, which runs a platform for youths to create and play their own video games, said Thursday it will expand its presence to the Xbox One in December. “Bird Simulator” by Roblox video game creator Avian Skies. Left: The platform, coming to Xbox. “Bird Simulator” by Roblox video game creator Avian Skies....
Roblox, which runs a platform for youths to create and play their own video games, said Thursday it will expand its presence to the Xbox One in December.
